files.name: main.py
files.content:
# Peterson, Holly 

def repeatString (string,number):
    return(string*number)
    
stringInput = "something"
numberInput = ""

while(True): 
    
    stringInput = input("\nEnter a string (blank to exit): ")
    if(stringInput == ""): break
    
    numberInput = int(input("How many repeats? "))
    
    repeatedStrings = repeatString(stringInput,numberInput)
    print(repeatedStrings)

print("All Done.")
